main event: A witness observed a single white light object moving slower than an aircraft but faster than a helicopter over a residential area, approximately 4 miles from the nearest business. The object was descending and made no sound, with no exhaust fumes or contrails.
interesting points: The object appeared to be sharp and a single white light.
The object changed color during the sighting.
The object gradually moved away and disappeared from view.
No other aircraft were observed in the area during the sighting.
